item.title: Instant Pot Lentil Soup
item.description: Ingredients 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 1 medium yellow onion — small diced 4 medium carrots 3 stalks celery 4 springs fresh thyme 1 teaspoon kosher salt 3⁄4 teaspoon smoked paprika 1⁄2 teaspoon black pepper 2 cups red lentils 4 cloves garlic — minced (about 4 teaspoons) 1 can fire-roasted diced tomatoes — (15 ounces) 1 can fire-roasted crushed tomatoes — (15 ounces) 6 cups broth (veggie, beef or chicken will work well) Preparation Drizzle the oil into the Instant Pot.
